name: TroopMaster Automated Reports
short_description:
Based on python and an older pywinauto library, this library of scripts makes it possible to automate TroopMaster reports that you would like to run frequently.  When tied together with solutions like Dropbox and linked to your website it is possible to quickly provide updated reports for your Troop's leaders, boys, and parents.

The library will briefly take control of your computer to start TroopMaster DotNet, create a predefined set of PDF reports (common reports that our large Troop currently uses today) as if you were doing the mouse movements, mouse clicking, and keyboard entry yourself.

Currently this works with Windows and TroopMaster 2013 client pulling from DotNet.

If you are willing to have your computer not lock after being idle, you can set the reports to run on a scheduled basis using Window's task scheduler, otherwise you can run the entire suite of reports with a simple double click of your mouse.
summary: TMAR is a scripted solution to create TroopMaster reports
